plot: We were ThreeWe met for the first time during 1st year Masters in BiotechnologyWe became friends foreverIn Indore, our life was perfect…college, seniors, fresher’s, canteen, girl friend…Then something happened…One of us got murdered in mysterious circumstances…We tried to find the answers…and it turned our lives upside downSometimes friendship is very costly… but it teaches the meaning and values of relationship, love, life and death.And that is why; whatever it takes…after all…We were Three
